tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmergencyData (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_date DATE,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_location VARCHAR(100),
  casualties INT,
  rescue_teams_dispatched INT
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE incident_responders (
    responder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    incident_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES emergency_incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EmergencyEvents (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EmergencyResponders (
    responder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    responder_name VARCHAR(50),
    responder_type VARCHAR(50),
    deployment_date TIMESTAMP,
    department VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT REFERENCES EmergencyEvents(event_id),
    responder_id INT REFERENCES EmergencyResponders(responder_id),
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    report_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_calls (
   id INT,
   call_date DATE,
   call_time TIME,
   caller_name VARCHAR(50),
   caller_location VARCHAR(100),
   emergency_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE response_team (
   team_id INT,
   team_name VARCHAR(50),
   team_lead VARCHAR(50),
   team_members INT,
   availability_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
   incident_id INT,
   incident_date DATE,
   incident_time TIME,
   incident_location VARCHAR(100),
   incident_description TEXT,
   incident_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE resources (
   resource_id INT,
   resource_name VARCHAR(50),
   resource_type VARCHAR(50),
   resource_quantity INT,
   resource_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE emergencies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    severity INT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    resource_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT NOT NULL,
    team_id INT NOT NULL,
    incident_date DATE NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
